mapper.insert: insert into T_RECRUIT (RI_ID, RI_DEPARTMENT, RI_POSITION, RI_SALARY, RI_REQUIREMENT, RI_INFORMATION, RI_ISON) values (RECRUIT_SEQ.nextval,#{ri_department},#{ri_position},#{ri_salary},#{ri_requirement},#{ri_information},#{ri_ison})
mapper.update: update T_RECRUIT set RI_ISON=#{ri_ison} where RI_ID=#{ri_id}
